title.rendered: STEDI  2 TO 1 DEUTSCH CONNECTOR / SPLITTER | 2 LIGHTS WITH 1 WIRING HARNESS 1.5M

content.rendered:
2 to 1 DT Connectors

OVERVIEW

Our 2 to 1 Deutsch Connector allow you to split a single plug into 2 allowing you to run 2 driving/work lights off the same switch & harness.

PLUG & PLAY

Male & Female plugs for running directly from the harness and straight into the back of your lights.

COMPATABILITY

Compatible with all wiring harnesses for LED, HID and Halogen Lights that run a DT connector. Make sure you are familiar with DT & DTP connectors as they are not cross compatible with one another.

DETAILS

2 to 1 Deutsch Connector Splitter allows the connection of two accessory lights using one of our wiring harnesses. DT2 Connector has a current rating of 15A, if your lights have a higher current requirement than 15A, we suggest you purchase our 2 Output wiring harness

Cable Length is 900mm

Extended Length is 1500mm

SPECIFICATIONS

  • 16AWG Cable
  • Waterproof DT Connectors
  • Cable placed inside conduit

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 to 1 Wiring Harness Splitter
